question.title: Webdriver BiDi listeners, getting bodies of request and response
question.body:
Hi I am trying to replace devtools with BiDi in my project. Can I get request and response bodies from BeforeRequestSent and ResponseDetails? any form like json or byte sequence or string would be great.

like this for example:

network.onBeforeRequestSent(request -> {           
    System.out.println(request.getBody());
    System.out.println(request.getRequest().getRequestBody());
    System.out.println(network.getRequestBody(request.getRequest().getRequestId()));
});
